alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 13 at 9:02PM EDT until April 17 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise. .Runoff from heavy rain will cause the Green River at Paradise to rise into minor flood stage. The river is forecast to rise into flood stage tonight and remain above flood stage until Sunday. For the Green River...including Paradise...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 379.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 382.6 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
